item.description:
BABY Itsy Bitsy Yoga Class Description (newborns to pre-crawling):
Baby Itsy Bitsy Yoga classes contain dozens of unique yoga postures designed to support baby’s development. Each class is filled with calming, nurturing ways to enhance bonding and improve baby’s sleep.
During a Baby Itsy Bitsy Yoga class, babies enjoy yoga while on their backs, tummies, or held in loving arms. For parents, this class is a special opportunity to meet other parents in the community, and learn about baby's emerging personality. Most of the yoga we do in Itsy Bitsy Yoga is for baby, but you will also learn breathing and relaxation techniques as you practice a bit of yoga yourself.
No yoga experience is required. Thank you for arranging just 1 parent/caregiver per family.

Next Weekend Baby IBY Meetup Time: Saturday, Apr. 2, 12:45-1:45pm
Cost: $15/class (pre-payment required w/ YES RSVP)
About Us: The Weekend IBY Meetup classes are taught by Alexandra De Collibus, Certified Itsy Bitsy Yoga Facilitator and Director of Absolute Yoga in Hopkinton, MA and Jennifer Mischley, Baby & Tots CIBYF.
Alexandra has offered IBY classes under the name Sweet Pea Yoga since 2003 and has taught hundreds of pint-sized yogis across MA and RI. Learn more at www.SweetPeaYoga.com
Itsy Bitsy Yoga was created by Helen Garabedian, an Infant Developmental Movement Educator, yoga teacher, and mother. Learn more at www.ItsyBitsyYoga.com
item.name: Weekend BABY Itsy Bitsy Yoga Meetup (April)
